Welcome to PuMA’s documentation!¶

PuMA’s code can be found here. PuMA is also available through iMicrobe.

About PuMA¶

PuMA is a pipeline written in Python3 for papillomavirus genome annotation.

The pipeline was created by utilizing several Python3 and command line packages including Biopython, BLAST, MEME, FIMO, and MUSCLE as well as user defined functions. For more information on how PuMA works, refer to ‘How PuMA Works’.
